quote_last: in the evening when the cook came aboard. He did not have the cabbages.
title: A Single Pebble
author: John Hershey

quote_last: — Pendel had somehow never doubted that Osnard would be punctual — along comes a brown Ford hatchback with an Avis sticker on the back window and pulls into the space reserved for customers.
title: The Tailor of Panama
author: John Le Carré
